plot: A short thriller/drama that touches on issues of social responsibility. The story of a man who accidentally loses his cellphone and is found by a person that will not return it and is unaware of the damage he could cause.
title: Desconexion
plot_es: A short thriller/drama that touches on issues of social responsibility. The story of a man who accidentally loses his cellphone and is found by a person that will not return it and is unaware of the damage he could cause.
